import React from "react"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; export const ToDoTasksTable = () => { const toDoTasks = useSelector(state => state.toDoTasks) const renderedToDoTasks = toDoTasks.map(task => ( {task.title} @(task.Category != "Uncategorized" ? task.Category : "") {task.id} @task.CreatedDate

Are you sure?

)) return(
Task Category Deadline Date of creation
) }
